name: Trooper 3
description:
Year 2083: After a hundred years, the video games industry has crashed again. You are Trooper, an out-of-work video games action hero, and are totally broke.. But things are about to change. Reports indicate that hundreds of disgruntled, out-of-work monsters from canceled games are gathering to attack the old studios to seek health benefits. The result will not be pretty. Can you prove that you're truly the last action hero (and also get paid)?

Important: Requires an Oculus Rift DK1 or DK2 headset. It is highly recommended that you try the free exploration version of Trooper 3 before purchasing the full version. This will allow you to test your system's compatibility with Trooper 3 before purchasing. The free exploration version is available at: http://cmdr2.org/trooper3-free
